enemy_description: King Slime is a very large, semi-transparent blue gelatinous boss with a visible ninja trapped inside its center. It wears a distinct golden crown on top of its head.

static_elements.element_description: The golden crown sitting on top of the slime. It features a gold band with three pointed spikes; the central spike is the tallest and contains a large, square-cut red gem, while the two outer spikes have smaller green gems.
static_elements.why_static: Unlike the blue slime body which constantly squashes, stretches, and deforms during jumping and movement animations, the crown behaves as a rigid object attached to the top. It does not distort or animate frame-by-frame, maintaining its specific shape and upright orientation at all times.
static_elements.why_solid: The crown is pixel-art composed of opaque gold, red, and green pixels. Unlike the body, it has no transparency, meaning its visual appearance is not altered by the changing background behind it.

recommended_extraction_frames.reason: At this timestamp, the King Slime is at the peak of a jump. This separates the static crown element from the noisy ground textures, placing it against a relatively clean blue sky background, which makes for easier isolation and bounding box creation.
